tit.cmt: 「千葉宗胤」は"Munetane CHIBA"と訳出しています。（登録）

sen.j: 千葉 宗胤（ちば むねたね、1265年（文永2年）-1294年2月12日（永仁2年1月16日 (旧暦)））は、鎌倉時代中期の武将。
sen.e: Munetane CHIBA (1265 – February 12, 1294) is a busho (Japanese military commander) in the middle Kamakura period.
Munetane CHIBA (1265 – February 12, 1294) was a busho (Japanese military commander) in the middle Kamakura period.
sen.cmt: 歴史上の事実なので過去形にしました。
sen.e: Munetane CHIBA (1265 – February 12, 1294) was a busho (Japanese military commander) in the middle Kamakura period.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 父頼胤の死後、元寇による異国警固番役で九州に下向し、大隅国守護職を与えられた。
sen.e: After the death of his father, Yoritane, he went down to Kyushu as an Ikokukeigoban (guard against the invasion of a foreign country) because of the Mongol invasion of Japan, and was awarded the post of Osumi shugoshiki (provincial constables of Osumi Province).

After the death of his father, Yoritane, he went down to Kyushu as a guard against the Mongol invasion of Japan, and was awarded the post of Osumi shugoshiki (provincial constables of Osumi Province).
sen.cmt: 簡潔にしました。
sen.e: After the death of his father, Yoritane, he went down to Kyushu as a guard against the Mongol invasion of Japan, and was awarded the post of Osumi shugoshiki (provincial constables of Osumi Province).
sen.cmt: スペース調整

sen.j: 宗胤は下総を離れたため、南北朝時代であったこともあり宗胤の弟・千葉胤宗に千葉氏の下総の本領を横領された。
sen.e: Because Munetane left Shimousa Province, and also because it was in the period of the Northern and Southern Courts, his honryo (main domain) in Shimousa Province was usurped by Munetane's younger brother, Tanemune CHIBA.
sen.cmt: 「千葉胤宗」は"Tanemune CHIBA"と訳出しています。（登録）
sen.e: Because Munetane left Shimousa Province, and also because it was in the period of the Northern and Southern Courts, his honryo (main domain) in Shimousa Province was usurped by Munetane's younger brother, Tanemune CHIBA.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: Because Munetane left Shimousa Province, and also because it was in the period of the Northern and Southern Courts, his honryo (main domain) in Shimousa Province was usurped by Munetane's younger brother, Tanemune CHIBA.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 千葉氏は、下総と肥前国に分裂することになる。
sen.e: The Chiba clan came to be divided into two groups in Shimousa Province and Hizen Province.
The Chiba clan came to be divided into two groups, a group in Shimousa Province and a group in Hizen Province.
sen.cmt: より具体的にするため、a group in Shimousa Province and a group in Hizen Province にしました。
sen.e: The Chiba clan came to be divided into two groups, a group in Shimousa Province and a group in Hizen Province.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 宗胤はのちの九州千葉氏（肥前千葉氏）の祖となり、下総国を本拠とする千葉氏は胤宗の系統が継承することになった。
sen.e: Munetane became the founder of the later Chiba clan in Kyushu (Hizen Chiba clan), and the Chiba clan based on Shimousa Province came to be taken over by the line of Tanemune.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理。「肥前千葉氏」は"Hizen Chiba clan"と訳出しています。（登録）
sen.e: Munetane became the founder of the later Chiba clan in Kyushu (the Hizen Chiba clan), and the Chiba clan based on Shimousa Province came to be taken over by the line of Tanemune.
sen.cmt: 「肥前千葉氏」に the を加えました。
sen.e: Munetane became the founder of the later Chiba clan in Kyushu (the Hizen Chiba clan), and the Chiba clan based on Shimousa Province came to be taken over by the line of Tanemune.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: しかし、宗胤は肥前のみならず下総においても千田庄、八幡庄などに地頭職を多く与えられていた。
sen.e: However, Munetane was awarded many posts of Jitoshiki (manager and lord of manor) not only in Hizen Province, but also in Senda no sho, Yawata no sho in Shimousa Province.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外処理。「千田庄」は"Senda no sho"と訳出しています。（登録）
sen.e: However, Munetane was awarded many posts of Jitoshiki (manager and lord of manor) not only in Hizen Province, but also in Senda no sho, Yawata no sho in Shimousa Province.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: However, Munetane was awarded many posts of Jitoshiki (manager and lord of manor) not only in Hizen Province, but also in Senda no sho, Yawata no sho in Shimousa Province.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 永仁2年（1294年）1月16日、30歳の若さで死去した。
sen.e: On January 16, 1294, he died an early death at the age of 30.
On February 19, 1294, he died an early death at the age of 30.
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ暦に換算しました。
sen.e: On February 19, 1294, he died an early death at the age of 30.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
